synopsis.text: After escaping from her controlling father, Erina Nakiri finds refuge at the eccentric Polar Star Dormitory. Having lived a sheltered life, Erina struggles to adjust to doing basic household chores like laundry and cleaning. She has mishaps vacuuming and using the washing machine. Her dormmates cause chaos too, leaving the bathroom unusable at one point. To remedy the situation, the friends visit a public bath where Erina experiences another first. With support from the playful dorm residents, the refined Erina gradually acclimates to their lively lifestyle filled with memorable antics outside the cooking world. Though initially out of her element, Erina comes to find her place among friends.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
